text.title: Communicate Effectively With a Teenage Daughter
text.head: Communicate Effectively With a Teenage Daughter
text.p: Teenage girls have a lot on their minds , and because they 're young , sometimes do n't know how to cope with it all . This unfortunate fact can sometimes create tension between them and you . But what they may not know is that you are their biggest fan , and this article will tell you how to show them that , and how to develop a comfortable , expressive , loving relationship with her .
text.head: Steps

list.item: Figure out what makes her tick . If you know what she likes and dislikes , this will give you common ground .

Let her know that you love her . Do n't be overbearing with this one . Maybe you could start small . Write a little note and stick it on her mirror . Make her cookies . Give her a ride somewhere . Come to her games or plays .

Forgive her . She is young and is still figuring things out . Teach her what she did wrong if she 's made a mistake , but make sure she knows you still love her . Let her know that you forgive her and understand that everybody makes mistakes .

Realize that teenage girls are EXTREMELY emotional . This is true for every single teenage girl , whether they show it on the outside or not . Just because she yells at you does n't mean she hates you . If she does , it 's probably because she has reached the end of her rope and does n't know how to react to her situation . Let her cry if she needs to . Cry with her , but not too much . Rejoice with her . Be a strong anchor for her while her emotions are unsettled from hormones , lack of sleep , and too much going on .
Do things with her . Find activities you both enjoy and spend time together .
Try to see things from her perspective . This is a big one . Try to see what circumstances and emotions are making her think the ways she does .

Make sure she knows she can come to you with concerns . This is huge . When a teenage daughter knows that they can go to their parent(s) with concerns , problems , and joys , it makes communication meaningful and easy .
Make sure she knows that you are interested in her life and concerns .

text.head: Video
Tips

list.item: Give her hugs , if she likes it . But even if she does n't hug her once in a while .
Make sure you have a general idea of where she is and what she 's doing .
Make sure she knows that you are there for more than just telling her what to do .
Even if it seems like you 're not getting through to her , you really are . She is probably too proud or emotional to show it .
Every once in a while , give her a break with chores and such if she needs it . This will help her know that you realize she needs breaks sometimes and that you love her .
Sometimes , but not always , you need to initiate the conversations . There 's a delicate balance of initiating and not initiating conversation which depends on each girl .

text.head: Warnings

list.item: Do n't scold her in front of her friends or other people she cares about .
Do n't let her control you . That is , make sure that you are still the boss . Parents need to teach their children , but do it gently .
Do n't let her have too much or too little freedom . Both of these can have very bad outcomes .
Do n't tease about boys too much . This will push away open conversation about boys and dating .
